titles.title: Fostering Innovation Act of 2013
To provide an exemption for low-revenue companies from certain SEC regulations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 7/9/2013--Introduced. Fostering Innovation Act of 2013 - Directs the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to redefine "accelerated filer" with respect to issuers of securities required to meet accelerated deadlines for filing their Form 10-Q quarterly reports. Requires the SEC to include among accelerated filers any issuers of securities that have: (1) annual revenues in excess of $100 million, and (2) an aggregated worldwide market value between $250 million and $700 million of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates.
